properties.name: speaker_role
properties.description: The professional role or title of the speaker within their organization.
example_values: Director Methods Center for Causal Inference

properties.name: speaker_affiliation
properties.description: The organization or specific department/center the speaker is affiliated with.

properties.name: years_at_rand
properties.description: The duration of the speaker's tenure or study at RAND.
example_values: about two or three months ago

properties.name: primary_research_area
properties.description: The main topical subjects or domains the speaker focuses on in their research.

properties.name: primary_methods_used
properties.description: The main research methodologies or techniques the speaker employs in their work.
example_values: Qualitative interviewing, social media analytics, surveys
Quantitative (optimization, modeling, simulation, coding), some qualitative
Mostly quantitative (existing data, primary data collection, descriptive, causal modeling, cost-benefit analysis), mixed methods
Qualitative (interviews, focus groups, lit review, historical archival analysis), quantitative (statistical analysis, forecasting, large data models)

properties.name: ai_tool_experience
properties.description: Specific AI tools or types of AI tools the speaker has used or is familiar with.

properties.name: ai_use_cases
properties.description: Specific tasks or applications for which the speaker has used or envisions using AI.
example_values: Proposal writing (poking holes, executive summary, image generation)

properties.name: ai_concerns
properties.description: Worries, risks, or ethical considerations identified by the speaker regarding AI adoption or use.
example_values: RAND being put out of business

properties.name: ai_hopes_or_needs
properties.description: Desired improvements, potential benefits, or areas where AI could be helpful, as identified by the speaker.

properties.name: research_challenges
properties.description: Difficult or time-consuming aspects of research methods or project management identified by the speaker.
example_values: New data collection (designing instruments, permissions, building frame, testing, programming, implementation, OMB review)
Finding the right stakeholders for interviews
Time-consuming process of pulling data down, checking/annotating code, replicability
Project management (critical paths, coordinating multiple inputs)

properties.name: ai_adoption_level_at_rand
properties.description: The speaker's perception or observation of the current level of AI adoption within RAND.
example_values: Not as many ppl using it
Quality issues with RandChat vs. other models
